info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 3:02PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern York, southeastern Cherokee and northeastern Union Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 302 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Gaffney, or near Pacolet Mills, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lockhart, Jonesville, Adamsburg, Bullock Creek, Saratt and Thicketty. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
